Method to register a callback object to receive the result when it is returned or when the timeout is reached.
registerRRIntervalEventListener(BandRRIntervalEventListener) - Method in interface com.microsoft.band.sensors.BandSensorManager
Method to register a listener for BandRRIntervalEvents [Requires user to explicitly grant permission first via BandSensorManager.requestHeartRateConsent(Activity, HeartRateConsentListener)] (Also, this method will only work with V2 bands)

Method to remove the tile represented by the given BandTile object from the Microsoft Band
requestHeartRateConsent(Activity, HeartRateConsentListener) - Method in interface com.microsoft.band.sensors.BandSensorManager
Method to show an AlertDialog allowing the user to explicitly grant access to their heart rate data.
